text: José Luis Cuerda Martínez (18 February 1947 - 4 February 2020) was a Spanish movie director, screenwriter and producer. He was born in Albacete, Castile-La Mancha, Spain. His best known works were Butterfly's Tongue, Amanece, que no es poco and The Blind Sunflowers. He won a Goya Award in 1988. Cuerda died at his home in Madrid on 4 February 2020 at the age of 72.Muere José Luis Cuerda a los 72 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Goya Award winners Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish movie directors Category:Spanish movie producers Category:Spanish screenwriters Category:Deaths from embolism
title: José Luis Cuerda
